submission:
class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        n=len(nums)
        a = [abs(nums[i] - nums[n-1-i]) for i in range(n//2)]
        # c=Counter()
        data = [min(nums[i], k-nums[i], nums[n-1-i], k-nums[n-1-i]) for i in range(n//2)]
        c=Counter(a)
        b = sorted(c.items(), key=lambda v: (-v[1], v[0]))
        res=n//2
        for key,v in b:
            x = n//2 - v
            if x>=res: break
            x += sum(a[i]!=key and data[i]+key>k for i in range(n//2))
            res = min(res, x)
        # print(a, data)
        return res
